name: Project MTMU
description:
Project MTMU

is a car racing game with different modes planned+ more cars&Tracks. 

so far there is free driving/ sandbox.

7 Cars

-different classes of cars.

5 Tracks

-3 Tracks are based by Norwegian country / area.

-2 Tracks are based on small size (mini machines, toy cars, toy court).

more info on my home page: Link

PS: ProjectMTMU is temporary name.
